Title: Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData 9 Preview Release - OData
Description: We are excited to announce the forthcoming major release of Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData, scheduled for June. In preparation for this significant update, we have made preview versions of the library available to gather early feedback from our community. The following preview release is now available on NuGet: Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData 9.0.0-preview.2 Key Update The primary change in this release is the update of the OData core libraries dependencies to the recently released OData Core 8.0.0-preview versions.

Title: Simplifying Light and Dark Mode in .NET MAUI Apps
